What kind of story do you want this to be?

Random Shrink:
Neither you nor your giant(s) are aware of how you shrunk. You try to get the attention of someone who might be able to help you. This option should be primarily unaware. You may introduce random instances or factors that make you shrink or grow, become indestructible, etc. as long as it starts off with you not knowing.

You shrunk yourself:
You have a device that allows you to change your size, indestructibility, whether or not people are able to notice you, or other mind alterations, and pretty much anything else you can think of. This should be primarily unaware but you may pretty much do anything. Remember, you have the device, so you remain in control of the situation

They shrunk you:
Your giant shrinks you for whatever purpose he may have. He has a device that can control your size, indestructibility, and even mind. This story should start out aware, but can go to unaware if you want.

They grow into a giant:
It could be random, or an experiment gone wrong (or right), anything to make the giant grow. Unaware or aware is fine. You do not have to be the focal character in this, but a third-person narrating the giant's actions.

Every movement these godlike giants made was amplified a thousand times; they were monsters of legend, completely dominating the physical space, causing earthquakes which sent you tumbling with their every step, breaking through the air and causing vicious, destructive soundwaves with every word. You knew that if it weren't for the invincibility you might already be dead, or certainly in a lot of pain. There weren't even any that close to you yet, though that was about to change, and yet you felt completely powerless.

But that wasn't true, you realised. You had possession of the most powerful device on earth and you used it, turning on flight and increasing your max speed, allowing you to hurtle around the locker room - which was now your world - as you chose. Still on the bench you jumped up and felt an intense thrill of excitement as you flew through the air Superman-style. You accelerated, arm outstretched, up to the ceiling of the room which was normally about 10ft from the floor, but which was now over 20,000 feet away - in other words, over 4 miles! But you were going extremely fast, and reached the ceiling in mere seconds. You hovered there effortlessly, well above the walking skyscrapers, most of whom - at over 6ft tall normally - now appeared to be miles tall. You estimated you could land on their eyelashes and they wouldn't even notice. Maybe later.

Looking down at the oblivious and unaware gods milling below you, you pondered your next move.
12523.title: Shrink down to 1/32 of an inch

choices: Bite his nose and see if he notices.
Continue exploring him and the rest of the team.
125231.content:
You realised that your earlier description of a skyscraper was completely insufficient. Using your bracelet's calculator and browser, you tried to put their size into perspective.

Previously you were about 70 inches tall. Now you were...2240 times smaller than that. That meant that from your perspective, somebody 6 foot tall would be 161280 inches in height. That seemed a mind-boggling number. Converted to meters... that was 4096m... and the Burj Khalifa, the tallest building, was just 828m. It might come up just past the shins of some of these guys but that was about it.

Your mouth dropped open as you kept pondering the epic implications of your miniscule size... You looked down at your own toes and wondered. If you were 2240 times smaller, and a toe was normally around 1 inch high, that meant their toes were the equivalent of 2240 inches tall, right? In metres that was...holy shit, WHAT? 57 metres tall. A standard 2-story house like the one your parents had was only around 7 metres...in other words, a single toe would be easily big enough for you to live in - you could slip under the toenails of one of these guys and never be seen again. With a jolt you realised that the stadium you were in was only around 50m tall... so you could not only play live in their toes, you could play sport there? Jesus. You amused yourself by imagining a village of some kind being built under the toenail of a giant, completely at his mercy.

You thought about just a single one of their teeth, which would be about half that...god, that was still about 28metres...longer than a bowling lane. You amused yourself again, this time imagining yourself playing ten-pin on the teeth of a sleeping giant. All possibilities, you figured.

Shaking your head, unable to fully process the incredible enormity of your findings, you closed down the browser and calculator and looked down. The rugby team were still preparing their various gear...your calculations hadn't taken long.

Allowing yourself to fall from the ceiling you approached them, the air rushing past you. You were so light that any air currents threw you this way and that so you increased your flight stability using the bracelet, allowing you to zip to where you wanted with astounding ease.

You started by flying towards the Senior twins, Innes and Louis. Contrary to their name, they were some of the youngest players on the team, having just turned 20. They were also very tall lads, 6'4'' each, and both equally gorgeous.
https://www.superleague.co.uk/uploads/im...
https://www.giantsrl.com/uploads/images/...

You flew in towards them at top speed, covering the space very quickly. You noticed that the movements of the giants, though still unbelievably fast given their size, was a bit slower than normal. You wondered if increasing your speed had proportionally slowed down the people around you. That would certainly make things easier.

You started with the nearest twin, though you had no way of telling them apart. They were right next to each other and chatting quietly, and their words were almost too loud to be indistinguishable. It was a strange feeling - to know that the volume was louder than a hundred jumbo jets, to feel the power of it, but to be completely unharmed by it. Soaring towards the twins' handsome face, you stopped right in front of their section of the dressing room and stared at them both.

They were still looking at each other and sorting out their bags, and had no idea you were there. Unnoticeability had been turned off but you were clearly just too small to see. You laughed wildly and carressed your dick as you saw arms the size of multiple city blocks moving and manipulating his various kit for the game. You moved over to the other twin, who was a little further along. Just as you got between him and the wall, he reached directly over you and you were again greeted with an amazing view of his muscular arm as he grabbed his rugby shirt. "Shit," you said to yourself, feeling completely insignificant and loving it.

You decided to kick things up a notch, buzzing right up to the downturned face of the first twin, who was still rooting around his bag looking for something. You landed on his nose, which normally wouldn't have been a landing spot, but such was your miniscule height you were almost pulled into it with gravity. You were able to stand up on it if you wanted; you were in a trance-like state as you did some quick maths in your head; if a nose was twice as high as a toe, that would put the toe at 100m tall - almost skyscraper size in itself. You looked around at the bizarre landscape you found yourself on. Looking ahead of you you saw a huge rugby shirt hanging on the wall, with L. SENIOR printed on the back - so this was Louis you were on. OK then. You looked off to your left and saw his long eyelashes, and behind them, a magnificent green eye. You again felt a pang of arousal as you saw them move slightly and then blink almost in slow motion. Every few seconds you felt and heard a rush of air flowing through Louis' nose. The deep bass-filled Yorkshire accent suddenly flowed through him as he said a word that you think sounded like "yeah," but it was so hard to tell. Your hair stood up on end as the sheer noise of the voice so close to you felt like a train hitting you. You felt no pain but you did feel a pang of fear, as if the true enormity of these giants had just hit you... and you were trusting it all to a bracelet you found on the internet.

You shook your head. This was going great so far. Turning and hugging the nose you squeezed it tight, the slightly moist, warm and salty skin like manna to you. You licked it as you relegated the loud hubbub of the changing room to background noise, cuddling up against Louis' gorgeous face. You wondered if he would feel a bite.
125231.title: For now, flit between these celestial bodies at...

choices: Too small to even notice a bite on the nose!
1252311.content: You noticed lower down were some of the nose's pores; you could possibly even fall into one of those. Your mind raced with the possibilities of what that would be like. You were up near the bridge now though, and that's where you made your bite as you took a deep breath.
1252311.title: Bite his nose and see if he notices.

choices: Take up the challenge; to get a fraction of attention from a miles-high giant.
12523111.content:
Nothing. You nibbled at the skin a few more times, enjoying its salty and satisfying flavour, but Louis didn't react at all. The mouth below kept making indescribably loud sounds and vibrating the head you were perched on, and there was no reaction at all to your bite. You couldn't help but feel just a little bit disappointed that you were now so small you couldn't be heard even if you wanted to.

You pondered for a moment. You could turn this into a challenge - what would you need to do to make the giant in some way alter his behaviour? You weren't even causing the tiniest itch or irritation on his nose at your current height, so maybe you could try somewhere else to force even the smallest reaction. It would make you feel almost superhuman to get a living mountain to react to you in even the smallest way - like being acknowledged personally by god himself.

Or you could leave it and go somewhere else, maybe make yourself a bit bigger and keep having fun in the locker room.
12523111.title: Too small to even notice a bite on the nose!

choices: Lose your nerve and get out of the way of the hand
Stay and see what happens to be scratched by a giant
12523112.content:
You sank your teeth as hard as you could into the skin on the bridge of Louis' nose and waited. The giants around you were nearly in slow-motion so it might take a minute to see the reaction. You nibbled him a few more times, enjoying the salty flavour. You were way, way too small to ever draw blood or really hurt the innocent titan, so you really went to town.

Suddenly all light and sound around you seemed to stop as if both being blocked by something. You turned around to see a hand, a terrifyingly large, rugby-playing, dominant hand coming towards you...clearly Louis had felt some kind of an itch, some minor, insignificant irritation. He probably didn't even know he was about to scratch his nose. It was probably just instinct. He certainly hadn't said anything.

You looked closer at the hand in all of its magnificent detail. There were tiny, almost imperceptible callouses and bruises on it from years of playing rugby - it looked rough, manly, meaty. You imagined them caressing you at full size, or grabbing and squeezing you at a height of maybe 4 inches, and both possibilities excited you considerably. Every finger except the little one was around 150 metres long; there were smaller skyscrapers.

And they were coming right for you.

Even though you knew you were completely invincible it still stopped your heart to witness its slow, laborious approach. You wondered what would happen were it to make contact with you.
12523112.title: Louis feels *something*.

choices: You were stuck to his nose...somewhere.
You were smushed into the his hand.
125231122.content:
The hand was roughly the size of a cathedral, which seemed fitting for the religious experience that this was. And that cathedral was moving, inexorably, towards you.

Slowly the hand titled to one side, creating an air current that would have blown you away had you not been able to resist it using the bracelet. You felt the temperature rise as it approached, now with the index finger closest to you. It was undoubtedly headed right for you - that bite had worked. You wondered if there was a limit on your invincibility...well, now the finger, which was over 800 feet wide, was filling your version, so you supposed you were about to test that limit. The slight pull of the finger's gravity threatened to dislodge you because you weren't expecting it, but you held on and took a deep breath as the finger finally made contact with you and the nose.

The giant Louis rubbed it aggressively in response to the sudden itch he had experienced, and the weight and force you felt was overwhelming. The tiny piece of the giant's finger that had made contact with the nose was enough to totally dominate your presence and the intense heat and overwhelming arousal of the situation threatened to knock you senseless. The salty smell of the giant's finger, coupled with what you thought was...dick...did not help with that. Maybe he'd had his finger down his pants lately. Whatever the reason, it was a nice scent, as you were smushed aggressively into the nose, rolled back and forth under the intense pressure of the finger. You couldn't say or do anything, even activate the bracelet. You'd just have to wait until this was over, but you were fine with that. Louis dominating you with just half a finger was sensational.

Eventually Louis pulled his hand away, his itch apparently satisfied. What had happened to you?
125231122.title: The hand of god

Pushed in between the pores of the nose; now you're inside it!

choices: Bite him again, harder, multiple times
12523112211.content:
You were still in pretty much exactly the same place; it was almost like you were too small for a hand the size of a building to move you anywhere of note. It was longer than the Empire State Building, after all, you weren't surprised you were beneath its notice.

You wondered what would happen if you were to bite him again, but harder, more aggressively, and multiple times. Would the young giant rugby player scratch again? Harder this time? Would he check the mirror to see what was cuasing the minor irritation on his nose? You wondered what might happen then - would he see you? You held out your hand and made an inch, then halved the distance until you got to 1/32. You figured that was just big enough to see if you were REALLY looking. That might be interesting. There was surely no way he would recognise you as human.

Or if it was his attention you wanted, you could always fly right up to his eye, even land on his long eyelashes, see what he does. You could even get tangled up in the lad's eyebrow hair if you were that way inclined. Jesus christ - at this height a handsome, muscular body like this was pretty much the best theme park ever, you thought.

So what was the next attraction?
12523112211.title: Exactly where you were a minute ago.

choices: Louis doesn't notice; the scratch before was either automatic or a coincidence.
The giant made an annoyed grunt in slow motion. He'd noticed! Now what?
125231122111.content:
You noticed a large pore nearby that was the same size as you. You grew up slightly - you were still probably like 1/30 of an inch and utterly miniscule, but now you wouldn't get pushed inside Louis' nose or fall in somehow, which you couldn't even imagine. Maybe another time!

With that done you started to gnaw aggressively on the nose, way harder and with much more verve than before. Everything was still slowed down so you knew Louis wouldn't react immediately, but you were excited to see what he would do!
125231122111.title: Bite him again, harder, multiple times

choices: Saw nothing, and remained confused about the bites
Saw a tiny little something on his nose...
1252311221112.content:
What you thought was an earthquake emanated from the larynx far below you; it was hard to discern tone but it sounded irritated. You laughed and continued your attack on the giant nose before the heat of the hand and the blocking out of the light returned again. This time you easily dodged out of the way of the hand with your ability to fly, and watched as he rubbed the top of the nose where you'd just been. The hand left and you returned to the nose, attacking it relentlessly with your teeth. The hand came back. You repeated this back and forth for a while until Louis grunted again, this time even more angrily, and this one was accompanied by pounding footsteps miles below you on the floor. He was heading to the bathroom.

You struggled to maintain a grip, as every footfall shook you wildly around, but you kept up the attack. The hand returned and this time stayed pressed down on the nose; you moved out of the way again, and bit a part that wasn't covered. The hand moved to cover that so you flew elsewhere on it. And this went on and on until he reached the bathroom mirror, the noise of the dressing room having subsided. His hand went down to his side again and you flew to the spot on the bridge of the nose you'd occupied previously. You bit it again, your jaw starting to ache at this point, and then turned around, standing on the nose and staring at the mirror. There stood a frighteningly tall, very handsome, confused-looking rugby player. You stared at his reflection, particularly his nose, trying to spot yourself; you jumped up and down on the nose, but saw nothing. Wow, you really were tiny.

Louis leaned in very close to the mirror, the front of his conk almost touching the glass, and, once you recovered your balance, you tried again. This time you did see a miniscule figure bouncing up and down on the slightly moist skin of the bridge of the nose and you felt a rush of new excitement to see yourself, a flea on the body of this god.

Louis, meanwhile...
1252311221112.title: An irritated giant Giant

12523112211122.content:
"The fuck is that..." muttered Louis in his strong, Yorkshire accent. It was thrilling to be found. Louis was squinting, and you were looking directly at his eyes in the mirror. You were kind of making eye contact, but you were sure that making out facial detail was impossible. Even you, when looking in the mirror, couldn't, so god only knew how his massive eyes would find that level of focus.

So you were left with a choice. Louis was clearly trying to figure out what you were and you could sense he was about to make a grab for you. You could let him pinch you between those two colossal fingers and see what he did, or you could buzz around his head, increasing your speed and annoying him even more. His confusion was kind of fun.
12523112211122.title: Saw a tiny little something on his nose...

He thinks you're a bug and you get flicked away!
125231122111221.content:
Sure enough, Louis' fingers reached out for you in slow motion. You held your breath as the arm and hand and long digits reached inexorably for you, wondering what could happen next. You knew the fingers wouldn't crush you due to your invincibility, which was a good job.

As it turned out, Louis didn't grab you at all. He used a single finger and almost brushed you, far more delicately than you would have expected, using his index finger. You rolled immediately onto his thumb, helpless against his incredible strength! Then you were held up to his left eye and you marvelled at its size and at the way it regarded you.

"What are you then?" Louis' voice boomed from below you. He was muttering but you were able to discern every word now.
"I'm a huge fan," you shouted at the eye, knowing there was no chance he'd hear you.
The eye squinted even more.
"Little bastard," he grunted, and you heard him rubbing his nose with his other hand.
You started shouting and waving, curious as to what would happen.
125231122111221.title: Let him grab you!

Escape the bottle - maybe return later.
1252311221112211.content:
The eye narrowed still further. "What..." came the voice. "You're not...nah..." he boomed out and you couldn't help but laugh. You could almost see his brain trying to come to terms with what he could see on his thumb.

"Later," he said suddenly and you realised what he meant. He had to stay focussed on the game.

You were suddenly moved away from the eye and down a little. Looking up you saw intense concentration on his face as you were suddenly brushed into the palm of his other hand. Then he turned and walked away, the palm cupped around you so you fell right into the centre of it. You sat down, quite happy to go along for the ride.

Before long Louis had re-entered the noisy changing room and returned to his area, next to his brother Innes. Looking up, you saw the giant gazing at the miniscule speck in his hand before, with his other huge paw, looking for something in his bag. You didn't know what it was until the hand you were on moved towards it and you were tipped inside - a bottle of pills, possibly protein supplements. You slid, landing on top of one of them, clearly standing out against the white pills. Looking up through the tube, Louis gave you one last curious look before putting the lid back on the bottle, landing you in total darkness. It shook wildly as it was put back in his bag, the pills piling on top of you. You flew up and above them.

Well, this was interesting. Clearly Louis wanted to take you home.
1252311221112211.title: He sees you're human...or a weird bug, at least!

You decided staying with Louis was the best thing to do. Also, the idea that you were trapped in here by him was kind of a turn-on and you wanted to continue playing that role.

So, with the noise of the changing room now considerably muffled by both the bottle and the bag it had been stowed inside, you lay down on one of the pills and went to sleep.

You were jolted awake when the pills began to move around again, tipping this way and that, cascading around you. You jumped up and stayed on top of them as the bottle stopped moving. The temperature rose and the walls pushed in slightly; the bottle was in Louis' hand. It was obvious. You took a deep breath as the bottle flooded with light and you were greeted once again by Louis' gorgeous face staring in at you. His face was moist with sweat.

Louis shows the bottle to his brother Innes

Maybe he was becoming accustomed to them. He gave an amused, curious half-frown before replacing the cap of the bottle.

You enjoyed the chaos of what was going on and kind of liked that you had no idea what was going on or where you were. Louis carried the bag to his car and, talking loudly about the game with his brother, they got into Louis' car and set off. It was about a 15-minute drive back to the house they were sharing, and soon you were home.

You realised you could easily live under the fingernail of a giant like this and decided to try it out. You thought about climbing there but it would simply take too long; instead, you reached for your bracelet and boosted your speed even more. As you expected, the hand you were on slowed down to a mere crawl and you let go, flying the 100 or so metres to the tip of the finger at a leisurely pace. You had all the time in the world.

You zipped around his finger a couple of times, examining it. It was short but not too short; not long enough to scratch anyone, but not ugly short. He wasn't much of a biter, you supposed. You checked that your invincibility was still on and then shrunk yourself still further, wedging yourself under the fingernail. Then you grew yourself back a little, pressing yourself right inbetween the nail and skin. You were now stuck fast to the skin there, completely encased and would be almost impossible to move. And you were looking out into the changing room through the strange pink filter.

Unnoticeability was still off and you wondered if Louis would feel something under his nail - and what he would be able to do about it.

Taking a deep breath, you turned your speed to normal. Now it would take you hours to cross the changing room, maybe even a whole day, at your normal walking pace. But most notably, the players' speed returned. And good god was it a sudden change. Your head started spinning almost immediately as the minute movements of Louis' hand threw you around.
12523112221.title: Get under his fingernail

125231122211.content:
You really loved being where you were, seeing the world through this blurry, pink filter, sheltered and warm thanks to the body heat from the skin that surrounded you. You loved every second of it.          "Hi, I'm Steven.", he says, "I know that all of this is scary, and you're probably pretty angry right now. We all are; or at least the ones of us who haven't been broken yet. But even so we've tried to create some sort of order for everybody. I'll put you on the rotating duty roster, we all switch out occasionally, especially because some jobs are worse than others. I'm still working stuff out for the next rotation, especially because we got in 6 newbies in the last two weeks, not including you. I can put you in laundry, which doesn't sound to bad, but you have to take special care of their pit-stains and socks. There's worship, which is usually just massaging them, but sometimes it can be a little bit extra (if you know what I mean). The last job is bathing. The boys insist on lathering up slaves with soap for their baths and showers. It's definitely the most humiliating and grossest, but it's understandable to want to get it out of the way. So which will it be? Remember, I'm not changing this if, and most likely when, you have second thoughts."
         He said this all very fast, but you were speechless anyways. You'd finally managed to snap out of your confusion before he got to the job descriptions. Weighing your decision carefully on how exactly you want to end up being a servant to these gargantuans, you finally end up choosing...

info.brief_description: You experience some size changing around hot guys
info.description:
In this interactive, I created a lot of choice chapters so that you can decide how the size change comes about. A lot of interactives start out with a cause, like a magic insect, a wish, or a science experiment. In this you get to choose, not exactly the cause of the shrinking, but how you shrink. You can shrink randomly, or be shrunk by a giant intentionally. Maybe he turns into a giant. I feel many interactives are just one of these, so I decided to make mine all of them.

Rules:
1.) Only male giants, there are plenty of GTS interactives out there. You can be a guy or girl, it doesn't really matter about that.
2.) Please, please, PLEASE, try to use good grammar and spelling. I will try my best to correct any small grammar mistakes, but I will delete unreadable chapters.
3.) No vore, this includes cock and anal vore. Entering the mouth of the giant is okay, but not being swallowed or chewed.
4.) No toilet stuff, farting is fine
5.) Try not to focus too much on the dick. I feel that in most Giant interactives that becomes the focal point, rather than a lot of other parts of the body. It's allowed, but try to be more creative.
6.) Death is allowed, but not too gory
7.) No animals or furries
8.) Age range of giants is 15-30
9.) Multiple giants are fine
10.) Please use the second person (You begin to run away, you say, "Oh no.", etc.)
11.) Language is allowed
12.) If you want to, add celebrities
13.) When adding a chapter for a new giant, please stick to the prompt
14.) It is fine to reuse a picture that someone else has already used in the interactive


When adding a new giant
Name (and link to a photo if you can)
Description of giant (looks, attitude, family, whatever) and a prompt

Choice 1: Name of Giant (or at least something that indicates choosing that giant)
Choice 2: More (or any variation)

Please feel free to use any of these photos
